html: Last week, a majority of House Democrats voted to give 16-year olds the right to vote. My Republican colleagues and I - joined by some Democrats - voted against it and defeated the proposal. The #Constitution stipulates the voting age should be 18, and I agree.

html: When Republicans took the majority in 1995, they guaranteed the “Motion to Recommit” – a procedural tool used to give the House one final opportunity to amend a bill – was protected despite the fact that it would benefit Democrats, who used it more than 350 times.

html: Last Congress we accomplished many great things, and if we can work together, we can continue making our nation better for generations to come. #sotu @WhiteHouse (2/2)
text: Last Congress we accomplished many great things, and if we can work together, we can continue making our nation better for generations to come. #sotu @WhiteHouse (2/2)

html: Tonight during the #SOTU, President @realDonaldTrump did a great job of talking about the future of our country. We can agree on our need to address #bordersecurity and immigration, fix unfair #trade deals, overhaul our nation's #infrastructure, and more. (1/2)
text: Tonight during the #SOTU, President @realDonaldTrump did a great job of talking about the future of our country. We can agree on our need to address #bordersecurity and immigration, fix unfair #trade deals, overhaul our nation's #infrastructure, and more. (1/2)

html: About to go live on @WWJ950 with Jason Scott to talk about the #SOTU.
text: About to go live on @WWJ950 with Jason Scott to talk about the #SOTU.

html: Now is the time to work together, negotiate, compromise, and make this country better for generations to come. Let’s choose greatness! #SOTU19 #sotu
text: Now is the time to work together, negotiate, compromise, and make this country better for generations to come. Let’s choose greatness! #SOTU19 #sotu

html: We must maintain pressure on #Iran to ensure it never obtains the #nuclear weapons to threaten the United States, our allies in #Israel, and free nations around the globe. #SOTU
text: We must maintain pressure on #Iran to ensure it never obtains the #nuclear weapons to threaten the United States, our allies in #Israel, and free nations around the globe. #SOTU

html: Free enterprise makes #America great. Let's keep it that way. #SOTU
text: Free enterprise makes #America great. Let's keep it that way. #SOTU

html: I support diplomatic efforts to stop #NorthKorea from obtaining nuclear weapons. Diplomacy should always be the first approach. #SOTU
text: I support diplomatic efforts to stop #NorthKorea from obtaining nuclear weapons. Diplomacy should always be the first approach. #SOTU

html: Starting to rebuild our nation's #military and fixing #readiness issues was one of the most important things we did last Congress, and there is more work to be done. #SOTU @HASCRepublicans
text: Starting to rebuild our nation's #military and fixing #readiness issues was one of the most important things we did last Congress, and there is more work to be done. #SOTU @HASCRepublicans

html: Proud to be #ProLife. #SOTU
text: Proud to be #ProLife. #SOTU

html: As co-chair of the #SchoolChoice caucus, we need to improve options and opportunities for students and families to find a school that works for them. #SOTU
text: As co-chair of the #SchoolChoice caucus, we need to improve options and opportunities for students and families to find a school that works for them. #SOTU

html: It's time to work together to fix our nation's #healthcare system, lower premiums, increase access, and reduce drug prices for patients. #SOTU
text: It's time to work together to fix our nation's #healthcare system, lower premiums, increase access, and reduce drug prices for patients. #SOTU

html: Now is a golden opportunity to fix our nation's #infrastructure issues, both urban and rural, as well as address our long term transportation issues. I'm proud to serve on the @TransportGOP Committee, where we can get this done! #SOTU #SOTU2019
text: Now is a golden opportunity to fix our nation's #infrastructure issues, both urban and rural, as well as address our long term transportation issues. I'm proud to serve on the @TransportGOP Committee, where we can get this done! #SOTU #SOTU2019

html: We need to rework #America's trade policies, which have been taken advantage of by both our #trade partners and foes for too many years. We simply seek fair trade with our partners. #SOTU
text: We need to rework #America's trade policies, which have been taken advantage of by both our #trade partners and foes for too many years. We simply seek fair trade with our partners. #SOTU

html: As the father of a #police officer, I am proud to support and stand with law enforcement. #SOTU #SOTU2019
text: As the father  of a #police officer, I am proud to support and stand with law enforcement. #SOTU #SOTU2019

html: We MUST stop the flow of illegal #drugs across our #border. They are killing millions of Americans. #OpioidCrisis #SOTU
text: We MUST stop the flow of illegal #drugs across our #border. They are killing millions of Americans. #OpioidCrisis #SOTU

html: "Legal immigrants enrich our nation and strengthen our society in countless ways. I want people to come into our country, but they have to come in legally." #SOTU
text: "Legal immigrants enrich our nation and strengthen our society in countless ways.  I want people to come into our country, but they have to come in legally."  #SOTU

html: I support legal #immigration. Our immigration laws must be updated. #SOTU
text: I support legal #immigration. Our immigration laws must be updated. #SOTU

html: I agree that we need to #secureourborders, and fix our broken #immigration system. With good faith negotiations and compromise it is possible! #SOTU #SOTU2019
text: I agree that we need to #secureourborders, and fix our broken #immigration system. With good faith negotiations and compromise it is possible! #SOTU #SOTU2019

html: "...passed unprecedented legislation to confront the opioid crisis, a sweeping new Farm Bill, historic VA reforms..." Glad to be a part of these bills! #SOTU
text: "...passed unprecedented legislation to confront the opioid crisis, a sweeping new Farm Bill, historic VA reforms..." Glad to be a part of these bills! #SOTU

html: Proud of the #bipartisan legislation we accomplished in the 115th Congress, and I hope my colleagues across the aisle will work with us in the 116th. #SOTU
text: Proud of the #bipartisan legislation we accomplished in the 115th Congress, and I hope my colleagues across the aisle will work with us in the 116th. #SOTU

html: Restoring the United States' #military readiness and strength is something I am proud to do as a member of @HASCRepublicans. #SOTU #USA
text: Restoring the United States' #military readiness and strength is something I am proud to do as a member of @HASCRepublicans. #SOTU #USA

html: #Unemployment rates across many groups are at historic lows, and more people are working than ever! #SOTU
text: #Unemployment rates across many groups are at historic lows, and more people are working than ever! #SOTU

html: We are extraordinary when we work together. We can achieve greatness. #SOTU
text: We are extraordinary when we work together. We can achieve greatness. #SOTU

html: Saddened to hear of the passing of former President George HW Bush. A WWII hero, he committed his life to service - serving as director of the CIA, Vice President, and as 41st President. His contributions to the nation were great, and our prayers are with his family and friends.
text: Saddened to hear of the passing of former President George HW Bush. A WWII hero, he committed his life to service - serving as director of the CIA, Vice President, and as 41st President. His contributions to the nation were great, and our prayers are with his family and friends.

html: Auditors said the Army, Navy, and Air Force could account for the existence and completeness of major military equipment. • However, auditors found many material weaknesses including Property, Plant, and Equipment; Inventory; IT Systems Security; and Financial Reporting. (4/5)
text:
Auditors said the Army, Navy, and Air Force could account for the existence and completeness of major military equipment.
• However, auditors found many material weaknesses including Property, Plant, and Equipment; Inventory; IT Systems Security; and Financial Reporting. 
(4/5)

html: I wanted to share some of the results of the audit with you: • Auditors did not report any material weaknesses for civilian or military pay. • Auditors said they found no evidence of fraud. (3/5)
text:
I wanted to share some of the results of the audit with you:

• Auditors did not report any material weaknesses for civilian or military pay.
• Auditors said they found no evidence of fraud.
(3/5)

html: I believe an audit is a good thing - especially for a department as large as the DoD - because it allows us to identify ways to better manage our national defense resources, as well as finds issues Congress and the Pentagon can work together to address. (2/5)
